b3432750-4806-4dcf-8f23-f706bd590174.name: Sun Certified Programmer for the Java 2 Platform

badge_template_activities.title: Methods of instruction include self-study online instruction, simulations, role play, online reference resources, quizzes and tests.

b14092c3-cad5-4a01-a722-ca5006d367f0.description: The course objective is to prepare learners for the Microsoft Certified Solutions Associate (MCSA) certification: Windows 8 certification that is comprised of Supporting Windows 8.1 Exam 70-688 and Configuring Windows 8.1 Exam 70-687. Students must take the course at an authorized instructional site to receive credit.
b14092c3-cad5-4a01-a722-ca5006d367f0.name: Supporting and Configuring Windows 8.1

badge_template_activities.title: This course is distance delivered. The methods of instruction include audio visual materials, practical exercises, and computer-based training.
The method of assessment is examinations with a minimum passing score of 70 percent.

3809f99b-446b-4814-8fce-9806263c94d7.description: The course prepares learners for the SWITCH 2.0: Implementing Cisco IP Switched Networks (300-115) Certification exam. Topics include network design; campus network architecture; spanning tree; minimal standard terminology; inter-clan routing; high availability networks; layer 3 redundancy; campus network security; STP tuning and pre-VLAN spanning tree and rapid spanning tree protocol implementation; layer 3 redundancy with virtual router redundancy protocol and global load balancing protocol.
3809f99b-446b-4814-8fce-9806263c94d7.name: SWITCH 2.0: Implementing Cisco IP Switched Networks

2006ee9a-4005-41c6-a83c-43c4a78c9d3d.description: The course objective is to prepare learners to obtain Systems Security Certified Practitioner (SSCP) certification. The general course topics include SSCP Domain: access controls, cryptography, malicious code, monitoring and analysis Parts 1-2, networks and telecommunications Parts 1-2, security operations and administration Parts 1-3, and risk, response, and recovery. Students must take the course at an authorized instructional site to receive credit.
2006ee9a-4005-41c6-a83c-43c4a78c9d3d.name: Systems Security Certified Practitioner (SSCP)

bc7a1eca-fdff-4411-a89b-43c670788827.description: The course objective is to prepare learners for the Systems Security Certified Practitioner (SSCP) Certification exam. The general course topics include access controls; security operations; security administration; risk management; incident response and recovery; cryptography; network and communications security; systems and application security; access controls; security operations; security administration; and test prep.
bc7a1eca-fdff-4411-a89b-43c670788827.name: Systems Security Certified Practitioner (SSCP)

706145af-aca9-42aa-86e6-8b5bd66be5bc.description: The course prepares the learner for the Troubleshooting and Maintaining Cisco IP Networks (TSHOOT) certification exam. Topics include logging and path verification; network traffic viewing, reporting, and monitoring; HSRP; VRRP; layer 3 troubleshooting; routing; OSPF; EIGRP; layer 2 troubleshooting; EtherChannel and spanning tree; EIGRP; BGP; BGP IPv6; and troubleshooting and manipulating output.
706145af-aca9-42aa-86e6-8b5bd66be5bc.name: Troubleshooting and Maintaining Cisco IP Networks(v.1)

badge_template_activities.title: The methods of instruction include audiovisual materials, computer-based training, and lecture.

3ac95984-7aaa-4c94-8a86-9b31412e97d2.description: The course prepares learners for the TSHOOT 2.0: Troubleshooting and Maintaining Cisco IP Networks (300-135) Certification exam. Topics include tools and methodologies of troubleshooting; IPv4 and IPv6 addressing and routing; open shortest path first; enhanced interior gateway routing protocol and border gateway protocol; RIPv2; RIPng; redistribution; layer 2 Switching and Inter-VLAN Routing; first hop redundancy protocol; security issues; router features; and test prep.
3ac95984-7aaa-4c94-8a86-9b31412e97d2.name: TSHOOT 2.0: Troubleshooting and Maintaining Cisco IP Networks

f4ded487-f989-4e8d-9968-1eebe9a4f6fd.description: The course objective is to prepare learners for the Windows 7: Configuring (70-680) Certification exam.
